``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Hook of hamate @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Flexor retinaculum @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} 5th Metacarpal (ulnar border) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}}))@gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} **5th MCP**: Draws anterior and rotates it towards the thumb @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
